items.text: tossed up on leg stump, shuffles and sweeps to short fine
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short and wide outside off, cut to sweeper
length ball on middle stump, stops on him as he looks to flick uppishly through leg side. Chips safely, wide of mid-on, in the end
over the long-off boundary. Lovely shot. Holds his shape and expertly launches this. That's class. It's a length ball outside off and he hits on the rise
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, SIX runs

items.text: short of a length outside off, opens the face and deflects towards point
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: cops it on the pad as he lifts his front leg to try and whip this short of a length ball at his hips
items.shortText: Cottrell to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: short outside off, drags it to mid-on with a pull
short of a length outside off. Opens the face and gets it down to third man
length on middle, clips to short fine from the crease
full on middle stump, flicked to long-on off the front foot
short of a length on middle stump, tapped to midwicket off the back foot
items.shortText: Nurse to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle stump, driven to long-off
short of a length on middle stump, tapped back to the bowler on the bounce
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full on off stump, can't get the drive past the bowler
items.postText: I'm off for a bit. Sreshth will take you through to the end.
items.shortText: Nurse to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Thanks, Varun, and it's still bright and sunny in Basseterre. Pristine conditions for cricket with some spectators using the grass near the boundary for picnics. Here's Keemo Paul
items.text: back of a length on off, and worked off his hips to the leg side for a single. Dribbles away to fine leg
flat-batted down the ground! Length ball outside off, and Tamim gets his front leg out of the way and swings through the line of the ball
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball on leg stump, but too short to worry Tamim. Defended away
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.text: full outside off, but Tamim walks towards the delivery and hits a Gangulyesque drive through to deep extra cover
slower ball outside leg, and this time Tamim scoops this off his hips, and over square leg! Rolls into the boundary behind square
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball on middle, and Tamim's mistimed pull goes straight to midwicket. Big over
items.shortText: Paul to Tamim Iqbal, no run

items.preText: Bangladesh's movement from 100 to 150 came in just 52 balls. Here's Nurse.
items.text: got him! Mushfiqur was trying to do too much there. Short on middle, and Mushfiqur went down on one knee - outside off stump - to try and scoop it over fine leg. But he misses his swipe, and the ball turns away from him and crashes into leg stump. Soft, soft dismissal
items.postText: Sumant Kumar: ""Gangulyesque", A new word of the year for the Oxford dictionary probably?" -- Please start a hashtag trend on Twitter. I swear I'll retweet your campaign.

items.text: full just outside off, and he defends with soft hands. Finds the bat's outside edge, but the ball sneaks betweek keeper and first slip. Gets off the mark with a streaky stroke

items.preText: MahneelMusa: "What is going to happen to Bangladesh cricket after Tamim, Shakib, Mushfiq, Mahmudullah and Mashrafe retire? The void will be literally impossible to fill. Alarming times ahead "
items.text: full outside off, and driven to deep extra cover for a single
wide outside off, and Tamim brings out the late dab past short fine leg
full on off, and that's been drilled down the ground to long on
items.postText: Kamani: "I think Bangladesh is going through their plans. Getting 200 before the 40th over"
